title: Can we talk about how disgustingly overpowered Akali is?
body:
Please?
Like, I see this character picked up by everyone even as just a random unit with no synergies because F it, broken as Hell...why not

At least Pyke was toned down a bit, still probably over the top with {{item:3161}} stack, but Akali is just insane


Nerf please {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}}

replies.body: well they big nerfed her shroud giving some counterplay with pink wards or vision trinket. She should be fine now.

> [{quoted}](name=Barso55,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=cTQ2eIXn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-19T12:56:05.250+0000)
>
> well they big nerfed her shroud giving some counterplay with pink wards or vision trinket. She should be fine now.

He refers to TFT as this is the board for that, but pink wards and red trinkets DO NOT REVEAL AKALI. True sight true sight true sight. Invisibility hides you from anything but true sight. True sight is Tower, Kai'sa W, (this patch) Karma W, Morg R, Leblanc Chain. Shaco's invis works the same as this, pink wards DO NOT REVEAL SHACO. Invisibility and camouflage are different.

>
> well they big nerfed her shroud giving some counterplay with pink wards or vision trinket. She should be fine now.

Smh pinkwards dont work on shroud, wrong king of invis buddy.

She CAN be pretty strong, but she is a tier 4 unit, so I kinda feel like she's supposed to be strong? Also she DOES have a synergy if you  have just her, she's a single ninja.

I feel like if you're building her up you should be rewarded with a strong unit. She's also pretty squishy. I guess if they HAD to nerf her they could increase her ability cost a bit, as five point strike is very low cost and pretty good damage.

But I really don't think she's TOO crazy.

> [{quoted}](name=Solidair3,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=cTQ2eIXn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-07-19T16:24:24.691+0000)

I really hate the single unit synergies in TFT.
Really, I'm rewarded because I happened to win the draw lottery once?

Not 3x, or 9x (true if you want 3* or typically a trio of 2* required for a decent synergy).

On top of that Akali uses her ult almost immediately it feels like. That seems pretty ridiculous.
Yeh, Ninja is like a mild version of Exile. Yasuo is often picked up late game with zero Blademaster synergy as well. Akali isn't legendary, but she is still epic and pretty hard to two star.

Just remove the crit from her skill and slightly compensate with it's damage.
Why can Akali of all champs crit with her skill but garen and GP can't?

akali is pretty mild compared to, immortal braum with warmogs or aatrox no items oneshotting 2 to 3 champions simultaneously, or draven with that faux atk speed nerf they gave him last patch, he still oneshots, or miss fortune using 1 ability to destroy your entire team, or stunlock glacials.
didn't see that this was in the tft boards and was ready to fight lmao

dam i brought the pop corn already.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

when i read this i was like 
AKALI HAS BEEN NERFED LIKE 15 TIMES IN A ROW WITHOUT COMPENSATION WHAT MORE DO YOU PEOPLE WANT??!?!?!

but then i saw it was tft and i was like oh ya, true. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I don't know, she's kinda busted but there are a LOT of other units that are busted too so it can kinda even out. 
She's definitely a hard carry for assassin comps though and I've seen her crit for 1400+.
